org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.pos

Class PositionFastaWriterBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.shared.fasta.AbstractFastaRecordWriter.AbstractBuilder<Position,PositionSequence,PositionFastaRecord,PositionFastaWriter,PositionFastaWriterBuilder>
      • org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.pos.PositionFastaWriterBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<PositionFastaWriter>

    public final class PositionFastaWriterBuilder
extends AbstractFastaRecordWriter.AbstractBuilder<Position,PositionSequence,PositionFastaRecord,PositionFastaWriter,PositionFastaWriterBuilder>
    PositionFastaWriterBuilder will create new PositionFastaWriter instance that will write fasta encoded sanger position information to the given File or OutputStream.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Detail

      • PositionFastaWriterBuilder

        public PositionFastaWriterBuilder(File outputFile)
                           throws IOException
        Create a new Builder that will use the given File to write out the fasta records. Any contents that previously existed in this file will be overwritten. If this file or any parent directories do not exist, then they will be created.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the File to use; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if outputFile is null.
        IOException - if the file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason.

      • PositionFastaWriterBuilder

        public PositionFastaWriterBuilder(OutputStream out)
        Create a new Builder that will use the given OutputStream to write out the fasta records.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to use; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if out is null.

      • create

        protected PositionFastaWriter create(OutputStream out,
                                     int numberOfResiduesPerLine,
                                     Charset charSet,
                                     String eol)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFastaRecordWriter.AbstractBuilder
        Create a new instance of a FastaWriter with the given non-null parameters.
        Specified by:
        create in class AbstractFastaRecordWriter.AbstractBuilder<Position,PositionSequence,PositionFastaRecord,PositionFastaWriter,PositionFastaWriterBuilder>
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream that the new writer will use to output the fasta data; will never be null.
        numberOfResiduesPerLine - the number of residues per line that should be written to the file. If a sequence length is more than this number, then the sequence should be split over several lines, each line never exceeding this value.
        charSet - the Charset to encode the output to, usually UTF-8.
        Returns:
        a new FastaWriter; can not be null.
